weka.classifiers.rules.vfdr

Class SufficientStats

  • java.lang.Object
    • weka.classifiers.rules.vfdr.SufficientStats
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    SufficientStats.MajorityClass

    public abstract class SufficientStats
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Sufficient statistics used to grow rules and make predictions on unlabeled instances. They can be of two types depending on the classification strategy used : naive bayes or majority class. These flavours are implemented here, as static nested classes.
    Version:
    VFDR-Base
    Author:
    Cl√©ment Fournier (clement.fournier@insa-rennes.fr)
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  SufficientStats.MajorityClass
      Implements the majority class strategy to classify an instance.
      static class  SufficientStats.NaiveBayes
      Sufficient stats for a rule that uses a naive Bayes strategy to classify instances.
